trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Levittown
There was one other sighting in Levittown on or around July 8th 2008
divs: sighting detailsoutside on the driveway locking truck. saw bright colors as soon as i went to the rear of the truck. looked up in the sky saw 2 yellow\orange objects. one was bigger then the other. thought it might be a shooting star. sat in same spot for approx. 10mins. didnt move then both objects went upward and disappeared. did leave a trail in a boomerang shape. i sat outside for 10 more mins mostly in shock and didnt see anything again.
Summary: Yellow/Orange glow in sky 1 big 1 small
